content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I read the contents of "new_file.txt" and successfully appended more text to it. I was also instructed to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page using the "google" command, which returned several links related to the capital of France. However, the command failed due to returning too much output and I was instructed not to execute it again with the same arguments.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -la"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 32\\ndrwxrwxr-x 3 1000 rvm  4096 Jun 13 21:41 .\\ndrwxrwxr-x 1 root root   32 Jun 13 21:40 ..\\ndrwxr-xr-x 6 root root   81 Jun 13 19:37 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    2 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm  1859 Jun 13 19:44 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm   108 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  301 Jun 13 21:41 file_logger.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  104 Jun 13 21:41 new_file.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  140 Jun 13 21:29 options.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   13 Jun 13 19:45 river.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
